pma:database.name: spin_results
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `player` ( `PlayerID` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT 'Unique player ID', `Name` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Player name', `Credits` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Balance', `LifetimeSpins` bigint(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT 'Total player spins', `SaltValue` varchar(255) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Salt value', PRIMARY KEY (`PlayerID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
